articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: Asia Set for Cautious Open as Trump Doubles Down: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian shares posted a modest decline as investors refrained from taking risky bets after President Donald Trump ratcheted up trade tensions. Copper futures in London fell on Trump’s latest tariff threat.
